resources.string: Vote app is an Android application in which user can vote for the politician whom they like. With the help of these app user can vote for Hillary and can vote for Donald. After the submission of their vote user can check how many users like Hillary and how many people like Donald.
The easiest way to vote for your favourite political party!
After submiting the vote you can check the results here!
public can give their opinion about parties!
Vote US is the best app that will help you to vote for your favorite political party !
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
